title: A Passion is Born
description: Training as an object-oriented programming developer. I learned programming      languages like Java (it was a new language with the Visual Code development environment), Visual Basic, SQL for relational databases. In this period I discover my passion for the developing

title: The Road in my job-life is marked
description: During this time I was able to increase my passion for economics and information technology. Working with SAP-CO, SAP-FI, analyzing and developing three-year Budget and Forecast plans of Telespazio S.pa.

title: Given to others
description: Missionary volunteer in Kenya. In his daily routine I helped the poor in the slums of Mombasa. at this time I learned to get out of myself and see others in their difficulties and help them!

title: ...new Challenge
description: at 42 I find myself studying again. Am I too old? I don't know ! this is a challenge! and I like the challenges !
